meta.job_title: Aide for Young Adult with Autism

duties_responsibilities.duty: Pick up client in the morning and accompany/coach/supervise through daily activities into the mid-afternoon.
Assist with volunteer jobs, exercise, educational classes, lunch, and recreational activities.
Ensure safety and well-being of the individual with Autism.
Maintain stability and commitment in the relationship with the client.
Must have a safe car for transportation, and ability to work the full shift for the day.
May work as an employee (may include benefits) or as an independent contractor.
